name: Escape the darkness (itch) (A_python_dev)
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the trijam #193 ont th theme Patience

I know there is a lot of bug in the game but i made the best i could

CREDITS :

Code, idea and graphics : A_python_dev (me)

i used a music from HERE

CONTROLS :

Arrow keys to move

LMB to aim and shoot

Go down side and don't let the darkness catch you. But be careful if you move too much you will lose your energy and you won't be able to shoot or move anymore...
